desc: You’re one-of-a-kind – we are too. Doing our own thinking, we’ve designed a unique series of mens underwear just for you. Since underwear is an intimate necessity, why not make it the best piece of clothing you wear? You provide the body, we provide the first-class fit, workmanship and materials.

layout.text: You’re one-of-a-kind – we are too. Doing our own thinking, we’ve designed a unique series of underwear just for you.
